title: Do i get my gold border and victorious ward skin if i get a 14 day suspension 2 days ago
body: will i get any form of reward for making gold at the end of the season if i get a 14 day suspension on the 29/9/2017?????

replies.body: no rewards. you have to have good behaviour for three months before the season ends.
Exactly. [No **skin/border/icon**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility) for players banned for 7+ days from 22/8/2017.
